title: Requires bills to contain fiscal impact notes listing estimated costs to an affected entity; requires fiscal impact notes to be displayed on the digital board of the assembly chamber
summary: Requires that legislative bills contain fiscal impact statements listing estimated costs to an affected entity; requires fiscal impact statements to be displayed on the digital board of the assembly chambers during deliberation of bills.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring that legislative bills contain fiscal impact statements listing estimated costs to an affected entity; in relation to requiring fiscal impact statements to be displayed on the digital board of the assembly chamber during deliberation of bills
